subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: As he prepares to fight Marcos Maidana in a welterweight world title bout Saturday night, Floyd Mayweather Jr. has come to rely on Leonard Ellerbe, his longtime adviser and the chief executive of Mayweather Promotions.
